name: Time Seek
description:
Welcome to Time Seek !

This platformer was made entirely from scratch in the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. Featuring :

- Time Rewinding
- Crisp pixel art
- Fast paced gameplay
- Responsive inputs
- Guns & Explosions
- Masterfully crafted level design
- 9 handcrafted levels with secret collectibles
- DEMONS TO KILL !
- Unique graphics (you'll understand if you play the game ^_^ )

We hope you enjoy the game as much as we enjoyed making it (10-15h of programming/drawing each day, yeah... that was tough)

-  Red Horizon

PS: Please note that we haven't tested the Mac and Linux builds, they may not work properly. Use the Windows version if possible.
